title: Broccoli and ham salad
ingredients: ['1 head broccoli, cooked and cut into florets', '1 hard boiled egg, diced', '150g ham, diced', '1 tomato, diced', '1/4 onion, chopped', '2 tablespoons crumbled feta cheese', '1 tablespoon plain yoghurt', '1 tablespoon mayonnaise', '2 cloves garlic, minced', 'salt and pepper, to taste']
